hibernate-mapping.query: from EgBillregister where expendituretype='Purchase' and id in (:param_0)
from EgBillregister where expendituretype='Works' and id in (:param_0)
from CGeneralLedger where voucherHeaderId in (select voucherHeader from EgBillregistermis where egBillregister.id=? ) and creditAmount>0 and glcodeId in (:param_1)
from CGeneralLedger where voucherHeaderId.id =? and creditAmount>0 and glcodeId in (:param_1)

select br.id, sum (gl.creditAmount) from CGeneralLedger gl,EgBillregistermis billmis,EgBillregister br where gl.voucherHeaderId.id=billmis.voucherHeader.id and br.id = billmis.egBillregister.id and br.expendituretype=? and billmis.egBillregister in (:param_1) and gl.creditAmount>0 and gl.glcodeId not in (:param_2) group by br.id

select br.id,sum(mb.paidamount) from Miscbilldetail mb,EgBillregistermis billmis,EgBillregister br where mb.billVoucherHeader=billmis.voucherHeader and br.id = billmis.egBillregister.id and br.expendituretype=? and billmis.egBillregister in (:param_1) group by br.id
from CVoucherHeader vh where vh.id in (:param_0)
from Paymentheader ph where ph.voucherheader.id in (:param_0)

select gld.detailTypeId.id,gld.detailKeyId from CGeneralLedgerDetail gld,CGeneralLedger gl,EgBillregistermis billmis where gl.id=gld.generalLedgerId.id and billmis.voucherHeader = gl.voucherHeaderId and billmis.egBillregister.id=? and gl.glcodeId in (:param_1)
select billpd.accountDetailTypeId, billpd.accountDetailKeyId from EgBillPayeedetails billpd where billpd.egBilldetailsId = ?

select billpd.accountDetailTypeId, billpd.accountDetailKeyId from EgBillPayeedetails billpd,EgBilldetails bd where bd.id = billpd.egBilldetailsId and bd.creditamount>0 and bd.egBillregister.id = ? and bd.glcodeid in (:param_1)
select billpd.accountDetailTypeId, billpd.accountDetailKeyId from EgBillPayeedetails billpd,EgBilldetails bd where bd.id = billpd.egBilldetailsId and bd.debitamount>0 and bd.egBillregister.id = ?

select gld.detailTypeId.id,gld.detailKeyId from CGeneralLedgerDetail gld,CGeneralLedger gl where gl.id=gld.generalLedgerId.id and gl.creditAmount>0 and gl.voucherHeaderId.id=? and gl.glcodeId in (:param_1)
select gld.detailTypeId.id,gld.detailKeyId from CGeneralLedgerDetail gld,CGeneralLedger gl where gl.id=gld.generalLedgerId.id and gl.debitAmount>0 and gl.voucherHeaderId.id=?
